title: Network Design Simulation Process Utilizing Iterative Learning Control

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of fundamental network concepts and general comprehension of control systems
context.additional_context: Network control design training for office/administrative professionals to strengthen language-domain job competencies

learning_goals: Within four repeated simulations, learners can explain the principles of utilizing static/dynamic segments in the FlexRay protocol
Through at least three practical assessments in VR environments, learners can design control systems applying communication bandwidth optimization
In project-based assignments, learners can quantitatively compare performance improvements (over 20%) of periodic ILC strategies versus traditional ILC
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
